`


```{r include=FALSE}
# kill -- 
library(tidyverse)
tmfs <- params$topic_model

x1 <- tmfs$topic_word_dist[, head(.SD, 30), keyby = topic_id] %>%
  mutate(beta = round(beta, 3),
         feature = gsub('_', ' ', feature)) %>%
  rename(id = topic_id)

x2 <- tmfs$topic_summary %>%
  left_join(two_ds$pca) %>%
  rename(id = topic_id)

sd_points <- crosstalk::SharedData$new(x2, group = "tm", key = ~id)
sd_features <- crosstalk::SharedData$new(x1, group = "tm", key = ~id)
```




Column {data-width=550}
-------------------------------------

### Intertopic Distance Map

```{r}
p <- sd_points %>% 
  ggplot2::ggplot(aes(x = X1, 
                      y = X2,
                      label = id)) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, color = 'gray') +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = 'gray') +
  
  ggplot2::geom_point(size = 10, 
                      color = '#a5c8e1',
                      alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_text(size = 3) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = 'none') 

plotly::ggplotly(p) %>% 
  plotly::layout(showlegend = F,
                 autosize = T) %>%
  plotly::style(hoverinfo = 'none') %>%
  plotly::highlight(on = 'plotly_hover',
                    opacityDim = .75)
```
